'''Blizzard Strayer''', also called '''Icebreaker''' in the [[Adventurer Handbook]], is an [[Artifact Set]] available at [[:Category:4-Star Artifacts|4-star]] and [[:Category:5-Star Artifacts|5-star]] rarities which can be obtained from [[Peak of Vindagnyr]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* A 4{{star}} Broken Rime's Echo can be obtained by speaking to [[Stevens]].
* Although the 4-piece bonus description says "a character," the bonus only applies to the wearer of the artifact set, not to other characters.

==Lore==
{{ArtifactLore}}

==Trivia==
*This artifact set is about [[Imunlaukr]] and the civilization of [[Sal Vindagnyr]].
